grammar.title: Grammar
grammar.subtitle: Learn Norwegian grammar rules and practice

verbs.title: Verbs
verbs.presentTenseRule: You add –r to the infinitive to form the present tense:
verbs.irregular: Note that some verbs have irregular present tense forms:

nouns.title: Nouns
nouns.gendersRule: The indefinite articles are en (masculine), ei (feminine) and et (neuter). The corresponding indefinite articles in English are a/an.
nouns.feminineNote: Feminine nouns can have the article en instead of ei: ei/en jente.
nouns.omittingRule: When stating certain situations you can leave out en/ei/et:

conjunctions.title: Conjunctions
conjunctions.rule: The conjunctions og (and) and men (but) connect sentences:

questions.title: Question Words
questions.questionWords: The most common question words are:

wordOrder.title: Word Order
wordOrder.verbSecond: In a main clause the verb is the second element:
wordOrder.negationRule: In a narrative clause the negation ikke (not), which is an adverb, usually comes after the verb:
wordOrder.questionRules: In questions with question words the verb is also the second element. In questions without a question word the sentence starts with the verb:

checker.title: Grammar Checker
checker.description: Write a Norwegian sentence and get AI-powered grammar feedback.

settings.title: Settings
settings.microphoneGranted: Microphone access granted for voice input

search.title: Search Vocabulary
search.subtitle: Discover new Norwegian words using the official dictionary API
search.tryDifferent: Try a different search term or check your spelling
search.tip1: Use wildcards: katt* finds words starting with "katt"
search.tip2: Search by word class: Use filters to find specific types of words
search.tip3: Click on any word to see detailed information
search.tip4: Use the + button to add words directly to your vocabulary
search.tip5: Click the speaker icon to hear pronunciation

news.title: Norwegian News
news.subtitle: Read real Norwegian news and learn vocabulary in context

chat.title: Norwegian Chat
chat.subtitle: Practice Norwegian with AI assistance
chat.chatPlaceholder: Write your message in Norwegian here...
chat.micPermissionDenied: Microphone permission denied. Please allow microphone access to record voice messages.
chat.errorProcessingAudio: Error processing audio. Please try recording again.
chat.welcome: Hei! Jeg heter Astrid og er din norske språkhjelper. Jeg kan hjelpe deg med å lære norsk gjennom samtaler. Hvordan kan jeg hjelpe deg i dag?

food.name: Food & Dining
food.description: Essential Norwegian vocabulary for food, drinks, and dining

home.name: Inside Home
home.description: Essential Norwegian vocabulary for rooms, furniture, and household items

nature.name: Nature & Weather
nature.description: Norwegian vocabulary for nature, weather, and outdoor environments

animals.name: Animals & Wildlife
animals.description: Norwegian vocabulary for animals, pets, and wildlife

counting.name: Numbers & Counting
counting.description: Essential Norwegian vocabulary for numbers, counting, and mathematical terms

family.name: Family & Relatives
family.description: Norwegian vocabulary for family members, relatives, and relationships

wordManagement.title: Word Management
wordManagement.noWords: No words yet. Add your first word to get started!

alphabet.title: Norwegian Alphabet
alphabet.subtitle: Learn the Norwegian alphabet with pronunciation, examples, and interactive cards. Click on any letter to explore its pronunciation and usage.

flashcards.title: Flashcard Study
flashcards.description: Review your vocabulary with interactive flashcards. Rate your difficulty to improve spaced repetition.
flashcards.noWords: No words available. Add some words to get started!
flashcards.sessionCompleteDesc: Great job studying! You've reviewed all your vocabulary words.
flashcards.rateDifficulty: How well did you know this word?

practice.title: Practice Mode
practice.description: Test your knowledge with multiple-choice questions. Words are selected based on spaced repetition.
practice.noWordsToReview: No words need review right now. Great job!
practice.scoreMessage: You got {{correct}} out of {{total}} questions correct!
practice.wordAddedBack: This word will be added back to practice.
